forex.title: Forex
forex.description: Trade over 100 currency pairs, including the majors, minors and exotics, with ultra-low spreads and fast execution.

preciousMetals.title: Precious Metals
preciousMetals.description: Speculate on the price movements of Gold and Silver against the US Dollar and diversify your trading portfolio.

stocks.title: Stocks
stocks.description: Get access to major international stocks (Apple, Google, Tesla) with no commissions or requotes and no hidden mark-ups.

energies.title: Energies
energies.description: Trade CFDs on spot energies such as Brent oil and natural gas with no commissions or requotes and no hidden mark-ups.

stockIndices.title: Stock Indices
stockIndices.description: Get access to major international stock indices (S&P 500, Nasdaq 100) with no commissions or requotes and no hidden mark-ups.

cryptocurrencies.title: Cryptocurrencies
cryptocurrencies.description: Trade the new era of currencies such as Bitcoin, Etherium and Litecoin with ultra-low spreads and fast execution.

commodities.title: Commodities
commodities.description: Trade over a vast variety of commodities (Cotton, Cocoa, Wheat) with ultra-low spreads and fast execution.

mainCard.title: Brand Introduce
mainCard.heading: 100% Stocks & 0% Commission
mainCard.description: Get exactly what you're paying for the commission-free stock investing.

secondCard.title: The Perfect Environment For Expert Advisors (EA)
secondCard.description: We've built the perfect environment for EAs to thrive - we allow scalping, hedging, news trading and more. No requotes and no minimum stop loss distance.

thirdCard.title: Instant Deposits. Fast Withdrawals.
thirdCard.description: Fund your account easily and securely through our wide range of payment options. Your funds are held securely in Tier 1 banks.

leftSection.subtitle: Make Your Move
leftSection.title: Trade Over 5600 Global Markets.
leftSection.description: We Offer Two Levels Of Pricing Depending On Your Account Tier.

investmentDecision.subtitle: Make Your Move
investmentDecision.title: Make Smart Investment Decisions With Brand

register.title: Register
register.description: Open an account by filling in your details.

verify.title: Verify
verify.description: Upload your document(s) for fast verification.

fund.title: Fund
fund.description: Fund your account with your chosen payment method.

trade.title: Trade
trade.description: Unlock thousands of instruments and start investing.

footer.paragraph1: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
